not
in( select UserId from Pam_OldManMappingServeMan where EndTime>=GETDATE() OldManId=#OldManId# ) a.Status=#Status# a.UserType=#UserType# a.SystemFlag=#SystemFlag# a.StopFlag=#StopFlag# a.Area1=#Area1# a.Area2=#Area2# $WhereClause$ order by UserName asc

select c.UserId ,c.UserCode,c.UserName ,c.Gender,d.CallNo From Pub_GroupMember a inner join Pub_PensionAgencyUser b on a.UserId=b.UserId inner join Pub_User c on b.UserId=c.UserId and c.Status=1 inner join Pam_ServeMan d on c.UserId=d.UserId where a.GroupId='00001000-0006-0000-0000-000000000003' c.StopFlag=#StopFlag# c.Area1=#Area1# c.Area2=#Area2# b.StationId=#StationId# $WhereClause$
